item.description: Before you head out for the night, come party with us at Middlesex Lounge in Central Square! Drop in any time between 5:30 - 7:30 pm to say hello, maybe have a drink, maybe have appetizers/dinner or maybe even find a few new friends who are looking for others to go out dancing after the pre-party...the possibilities are endless!
item.how_to_find_us: I will send an email out the day before the event with details...PLEASE CHECK YOUR EMAIL/OUR MESSAGE BOARD ON SATURDAY!
item.name: Pre-Party at the Middlesex Lounge
